section.title: SuperTux
section.p: SuperTux is currently getting an overvault. Thus this webpage is a bit chaotic at the moment and will most likly stay that way for the next few weeks.
The following links should help to keep the overview a bit:

ul.li: The orignial webpage of SuperTux, ie. the one that was used before the overvault started
The Milestone1 webpage, ie. the one that contains all the information for the next version (the one created for GotM)
The generic Development webpage, ie the one that contains information and ideas for future development, its mainly only here for brainstorming, its not meant to be implemented

section.title: Contact
section.p: Development is mainly coordinated via IRC (#supertux at irc.freenode.net) and the SuperTux Mailing list, be sure to visit both once in a while or you might miss critical stuff.
